info.name: Tegmentum
info.description: Tegmentum refers to a core area within the brainstem that extends throughout the midbrain and pons and is continuous into the medulla.  In the midbrain, it lies between the tectum (dorsally) and the substantia nigra and crus cerebri (ventrally).  In the pons, it lies beneath the fourth ventricle and dorsal to the basal or basilar portion of the pons.  Contained within the tegmentum are major tracts and nuclei.
